dsense.name: singleton
dsense.guideword: (single baby: not a twin, etc.) (非双胞胎等)

example.eg: Jenna has give birth twice and both babies were singletons.

dsense.name: singleton
dsense.guideword: (individual: not in a group) (不属于任何团体)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 个人, 单独的一个人

dsense.name: singleton
dsense.guideword: UK, informal (person: not in a relationship)

example.eg: Mark has been a singleton for so long that I'm beginning to wonder if he will ever have another relationship.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 独身人士, 单身女子, 单身男子

example.eg: Separate all of these all out into singletons.
This is a terrible hand; I have three singletons!
